fig, ax =plt.subplots()
table_data = np.random.random((10,3))
collabel=("c1", "c2", "c3")
ax.axis('tight')
ax.axis('off')
the_table = ax.table(cellText=table_data,colLabels=collabel,loc='center')
ax.plot(table_data[:,0],table_data[:,1])
plt.show()
